user_query: Can you analyze the financial time series data for the mixed asset class symbol '0008'? Retrieve the compact size data for the past year. Also, provide me with the stock quote price for AAPL and the major commodities' performance in the world financial market.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the financial time series data for the mixed asset class symbol '0008' for the past year in a compact size.
Fetch the stock quote price for AAPL.
Get major commodities' performance in the world financial market.
